metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3867 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: HashiCorp Nomad and Nomad Enterprise 1.4.0 up to 1.4.1 event stream subscribers using a token with TTL receive updates until token garbage is collected. Fixed in 1.4.2.

criterions.comment: nomad: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
